Suzume

$$ Filipino, Ramen, Hawaiian

Notes from the Business

Please indicate in notes if you prefer OUTDOOR Seating

About

  • Good for Groups
  • Street Parking

We specialize in Hawaiian inspired food. From pork ramen with braised pork in a savory tonkotsu broth or a refreshing box choy, peashoot salad tossed in a calamansi vinaigrette dressing. Our hearty, comfort meals are great after a long day of work or quick bite and casual hang with friends.

Photos

  •

What are people saying?

“We had "SHOOTS!!!", which was a combo special of "a big ass can of Asahi," a shot of Hell-Cat, and a plate of butter wings for 22.” in 7 reviews
“We had the spam musubi, chicken bao, sticky ribs, and fried chicken rice bowl.” in 5 reviews
“If I had to pick my top few dishes, it would be the bok choy salad and crunchy spicy tuna to start.” in 9 reviews
“We had the Cynthia roll, the Crunchy Tuna roll, two orders of the Aloha taco combo, and a Yao Yao bowl each ( don't judge, we were ravenous ).” in 6 reviews
